title: Mumble Rapper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, attack a number of players up to the amount of noncoherent words you said in the previous day chat.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- "Noncoherent" counts keyboard smashes, severe misspellings, filler words (uh, yeah, um etc.), swear words and anything else the host wishes to consider.
- You may only attack up to 6 times in a night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you (NK)

desc:
Post 3471
*Can’t hey fejnr like I’m shitting oidfg mpaeieri*
